entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 40%
